name: Axis: Chaos Room
description:
A one room boomer shooter, but you can't aim up or down. Guns still have vertical damage. Beat all 10 waves to win.

Submission for 7DFPS 2022

Controls:

  • Esc: Pause
  • WASD: Movement
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Click: Fire Equipped Weapon
  • Right Click: Kick
  • R: Reload

Tip: Conserve ammo by utilizing the axe.
